Class TruffleString.AsTruffleStringNode

java.lang.Object
com.oracle.truffle.api.nodes.Node
com.oracle.truffle.api.strings.TruffleString.AsTruffleStringNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
NodeInterface, Cloneable
Enclosing class:
TruffleString
public abstract static class TruffleString.AsTruffleStringNode extends Node
Node to get the given AbstractTruffleString as a TruffleString. See execute(AbstractTruffleString, TruffleString.Encoding) for details.
Since:
22.1

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public abstract TruffleString execute(AbstractTruffleString value, TruffleString.Encoding expectedEncoding)
      If the given string is already a TruffleString, return it. If it is a MutableTruffleString, create a new TruffleString, copying the mutable string's contents.
      Since:
      22.1

      public static TruffleString.AsTruffleStringNode create()
